article_node.title: Encryption Policy
article_node.summary:
This policy provides guidelines for adopting encryption technologies for organizational use.
• Customizable Document — Use it as-is or make minor edits.
• Boost Your Security — This six-page document can provide peace of mind that communications will not be intercepted and that sensitive information stored on devices can’t be exfiltrated in the event of loss or theft.
• Expertise Guaranteed — Created by TechRepublic staff through 12 hours of research, writing, and editing.
